description: Magically gifted with intelligence somehow, this large Rat is  the rumoured leader of the Rats inhabiting Krul Island, Darmov has plagued many villages. Claiming them under his own domain, he left all those inhabiting the villages to be slaughtered by his vermin followers.

The Skeletal Warrior of Snow Forest is a mysterious foe of from the tales of this area. Those foolish enough to seek him out will be faced by an unyielding foe who is more dangerous and colder than any winter storm. He carries a blade of Netherworld ice, so cold only the dead can wield it without succumbing to its deathly cold bite.

Leader of the Nomads, Gadraen achieved promontory position among the Nomads after leading a daring raid on the Goblin Bastion in the Withered Lands. Gadraen successfully captured and slaughtered the Goblin King himself, leaving the standing goblin army in complete disarray. With his two generals Ionlad and Iushal he is nigh impossible to beat.

Iushal the Unwise is a veteran of the Nomad Warriors. Although old he can still pack a punch in a fight and uses his staff as wicked club. He is well respected in the community due to his extensive knowledge of battle tactics that the Nomads have used over the ages to conquer their enemies.

Ionlad is Gadraens most powerful warrior, leading whole armies to great victories.  The only orders Ionlad completes with a gruesome finesse are -1. "See that?  Kill it. Now."2. "I want that dead."3. "Remove their heads."Needless to say, Ionlad is a warrior of great stature amongst the Nomads.

Eribor, King of the North Lands of Eridas in times past, was possessed by the fell spirit of a powerful Necromancer he slew in mortal combat. This event happened 100 years ago and since then the possessed kings body has turned to dust within his armor. The evil spirit still holds on however, controlling the armor for its own  evil plans like a ghostly puppet master.

Little Laughable Giggles.  This poor tormented creature believes himself to be the centre of the universe in terms of humour.  If you don't laugh at his jokes beware, he gets very aggressive.'Pull my finger, pull my finger, eheheh heeheh' will be the last thing any of his victims heard.
This monstrosity is highly armored and extremely resisilient to attacks.

Telovien was a beloved captain of the Elvish people. But one night he went mad betraying his people and rampaging through his city killing indiscriminately. Eventually subdued, the mages suspected he had been bewitched by sorcery. Unable to find a cure but unwilling to kill him the Elves imprisoned him in the caves, hopeful they may one day find a cure for him and return to free him.

Syndorell is an ancient Sorceress that was once feared for her majestic power. She has been corrupted by a tainted fate and is now doomed to roam the lonely halls of the Udan Hideout, as all her actions end in misfortune and pain for anyone touched by them.

The Nightshade Lord is an incredibly powerful being, ancient even for an Elf and many say he has transcended natural life and joined the ranks of the undead. It is well known that the Lord is a powerful sorcerer able to cast down his foes with a mere wave of his hand. It is also said that he controls his Nightshade minions solely from the energy emanating from his eyes.

The Corrupted Knights are said to have sold their souls to the Shadowlord long ago in return for great powers. Such power came as a price and now all that's left of these great warriors is an evil puppet that follows only the will of their dark lord. It is said they have travelled far to come and recruit new warriors to their unit and destroy any who dare who refuse this dark offer...

Cursed by something or someone, the one peaceful Tree Golems are now attacking the nearby villages and preying on anything they can find. They are fericious in their attacks and also extremely resistant to damage.

Within his Sanctuary beneath the Burning Abyss the Hellion is almost invincible. It is rumoured this is where he is most powerful and can be defeated multiple times and simply shrug off deadly wounds.

Mortek the Bright is the leader of the Gargoyles and resides within his domain deep within the Crystal Caves. He is far more intelligent than others of his kind and found a way to harness the dark powers from several unique crystals he found in the caves. Mortek keeps these crystals upon him at all time, obsessed with them and becoming addicted to the evil that flows from them into his stone body.
The Fegro frog is very timid indeed.  When confronted by danger, the Fegro frog changes its skin in an attempt to hide from its opponent.

These powerful human sorcerers discovered archaic magic's dating back to the ancient world. It is known that the Eredan Sorcerer draws their magical powers directly from the giant mystical beasts that inhabit the ethereal world.
Borrot is one of few ogres that actually have an ounce of intelligence, but also has an incredibly nauseating smell.
Kraken is the dark beast in command of the Shadow Lord's most elite forces situated in the South. Kraken led several campaigns against the Dwarven armies in the West Lands.
Elgrad is one of the Shadow Lords greatest leaders. He commanded the dark armies prior to the fall of the Sword of Light.
Osmar is a highly respected commander of the Southern greenskin legions. Old, and carrying a weight of experience, Osmar is a highly capable leader and should never be underestimated.
This hellish creature dwells deep within the Inferno Mountains. It's vast size means it can crush any normal size creature with ease.

The vicious Ice Lizard Alpha is seen as the leader of the Ice Lizards primitive tribe structure but mostly he is leader because he is the most hungry member of the species, obsessed with eating meat. They will stop at nothing to get what he craves.

The Ice Fang is the alpha male of the Ice wolf pack having ascended through the ranks of the Ice Wolfs through sheer ferociousness. Few can stand against this monster of a Wolf and live, and those who do come out with fewer limbs than they went in with...
The chieftains of the Frogmen are called the Bloated ones. They are the fattest and worst tempered of the tribe, which the frogmen see as a sign of power in the Frogmen race.
Deathroll is the biggest and most legendary of the Crocomen. Known to feast on whole tribes of Frogmen at a time, the Deathroll is a fearsome opponent.
The Fire Hippo is a Demon of immense power. It draws its power directly from the suns heat to wreak havoc upon the savannahs.
The Bastet Lion is the symbol for all that is evil in Azlorie culture. Its a cruel monster that unlike most beasts, kills for sport while devastating whole villages just for its own pleasure...

The Azlorie Forgzah Demon normally haunts wastelands and deserted places, but when called upon by the Azlorie Witch Doctors for aid against foes the Forgzah Demon appears ready to smite down all enemy before returning to its solitude in the wastes.

Borok the Bloody is the War boss of the local Orc tribe, the Two Stripe Marauders and got his name from his habit of smearing his enemy's blood on himself in battle and because of the bloody mess he makes of his victims?

The Ethereal Guardian was once a being of pure and good forces but once he was trapped in the Ethereal realm he began to succumb to evil forces and temptations of the demons around him. This eventually turned him into the evil being of destruction he is today.
The being known only as the Storm Lord lives in the swamps but is feared greatly by the locals as he can call upon storms and fire bolts of lightning at will to smite down his victims.

The Anklar Minotaur was in life a great warrior beast but after he was cut down in combat an evil necromancer reanimated him and sent the now evil creature of undeath away to cause meyhem in the lands of Anklar.
This gruesome creature stalks the landscape, creeping upon and attacking its unfortunate victims where razor sharp teeth begin devouring their bodies while still alive.
The Vampire assassin prowls the lands, using its magical cloak to conceal its form before creeping upon, and ultimately diminishing the life of its prey.
The Jawdore griffin swoops down upon its prey, clasping them in giant razor sharp claws before taking them to its nest high up into the forest canopy where it slowly begins feasting.
Girath is one of the most feared forest dwelling creatures, drawing his unsuspecting prey further into the forest and into his den where he ensnares them and slowly devours them.
Residing within the dark Melsaur Mountains, the Spider Queen waits for her prey to wander into the mountains where her webs ensnare, allowing the queen to feed off their entangled bodies.
One Eye was the most elite of greenskin warriors during the ancient wars, tasked with leading countless assaults on Elven fortresses. He now operates by himself as a hired mercenary.

Hidden within the Jahd swamps, the Trogladores sits waiting to stalk upon its prey. The monster was the result of a magical catastrophe, formerly a powerful magician before his experiments using dark magic went awry.
An ancient guardian tasked with the protection of the frozen forests, Weagr possesses formidable powers. Weagr successfully fought off the massed armies of greenskins during the ancient wars.
Grisha the Smasha likes to break his enemies bones apart with his pair of custom made maces so that he can then torture his incapacitated victims slowly to death just for fun?

The Lava Rock beast is an evil demon that was spewed forth from an ancient and evil volcano. Over the centauries his once molten body has hardened but it is still as evil and cruel as the day it emerged from the bowls of the world.

Forlo the Infernal was once a mighty wizard but was cursed by an evil spell and as he began to change into the creature he is today he also descended into madness. Now Forlo roams the lands like an animal burning and eating as he goes never again to become the once great wizard he once was.

Gorr is the Rarek Dungeon masters most feared slave. Tortured to the brink of insanity, Gorr is an unhinged individual often let loose to deter trespassers and cause havoc among the prisoners for the enjoyment of the dungeon master.

Zovrak the Unicorn has existed in the wasteland since before the time of man. Zovrak is a being of pure hatred and evil and is feared by all. Tales told about Zovrak tell that it was he who created the wastes from once fertile land and that the ash is the ashes of millions of cremated Elves that once lived here and whom Zovrak hated and burned alive.

Gronak the Merciless is the last of the great Goatmen shaman. Angered by the destruction of the Goatmens way of life he went insane and now attacks all who enter the wastes believing them to be agents of the evil flesh warlocks.

Marpolo is a mad renegade Zion nomad. He has attacked many villages both on and off the islands for no reason. Marpolo rides his Zion Whale called Cethedrum. The Zion Whales are magical creatures used by the peaceful Zion nomads to travel upon on their journeys; however Marpolo has tuned Cethedrum into a weapon of terror and must be stopped.

Mortugus was know as the most evil Centagus when he was alive and did many crimes against his people, but he was eventually caught and executed and his body buried in the Angal Caves far away from them. Unfortunately Mortugus was so evil that his body has refused to lie and has risen again to exact his terrible revenge on all who appose him.

Fozdon was once a adventurer who fell into the mouth of a volcano and somehow did not die. In the volcano he was possessed by a demon lurking within the lava. Now Fozdon is more demon than man and has become twisted and insane causing destruction in his eternal rage.

The Maletornic is the crowning achievement of the Techno Magi's skills. The Maletornic has been magically animated and gifted with the Magi's most powerful weapons. The Maletornic acts as the body guard to the Magi and stops at nothing to insure their safety.

According to legend Kozyu was once a loyal servent of an ancient sea deity. Kozyu plotted the down fall of his lord but was discovered, punished and was banished to the caves of Kozyu where over time he was warped into a foul demon. The demon Kozyu is now trying to escape the caves and must be stopped.

Lezhal has terrorised the jungles for many decades. Lezhal was once a lowly creature until he found an evil and powerful weapon, The Flame of Woes. With this weapon he grew in power and status and now is boasting about planning on leaving the jungle to bring terror to others. He must be stopped before he can do this.

Asura King Vashku is a powerful being of destruction. According to the myths of the area it was he who turned the land of Asjal into a frozen waste with his black magic and that he awaits the day when his power is strong enough to launch attacks upon other lands, turning them into the frozen wastes that Vashku prefers for his kingdom.

Ragnok is greatly feared by his enemies or prey as he likes to call them, harboring immense strength and deadly weaponry blessed by dark powers, Ragnok makes an opponent worthy of even the most brave warriors.

Sir Ozomond is unique amoung his cursed men. Although he is now one of the undead he has retained his mind. He is horrified at his rotting corpse of a body and he has nothing but hatered for the living.

The Horned Acolytes worship a nameless unholy god. Their god has now manifested himself to his followers as a being of pure evil. However he is at his weakest just now but is slowly building his strength. This unholy being must be sent back whence it came before its power grows and it becomes a threat to the world!

Kruxgor is one of the last Grothan Coelodonts. It is a beast that wishes revenge on all creatures who would dare hunt its kind to the brink of extinction. Unfortunately the beast has gone mad and become to much of a danger and has began threatening even its own gentle kind and has to be stopped before it does more damage.

A malevolent being known only as The Spectral Sabertooth haunts the area. In local Neanderthal tales is is said that this is the spirit of the last of its kind and it is forever looking for revenge for the extinction of its species.

Uk Nok Trvon was once a young Neanderthal adventurer. But on his travels he discovered a potent and evil weapon wich he now used against his very own people. This weapon has changed Uk Nok Trvon into a demonic and evil entity that must be destroyed.

Uk Nok Trvon was once a young Neanderthal adventurer. But on his travels he discovered a potent and evil weapon wich he now used against his very own people. This weapon has changed Uk Nok Trvon into a demonic and evil entity that must be destroyed.

Devka the Dryad was banished from her homeland years ago for practicing forbidden dark magics. However in her solitude she has gained in power and will soon become to powerful to stop unless she is destroyed now.

The Dinosauroid tribes in the area worship the creature known as Mar the King of Lizards as the embodyment of their reptilian god here on earth. Mar is a killing machine that most say cannot be stopped. He is everything that the Dinosauroids aspire to be and he is everything that most try to avoid.

Craydar was once the greatest enemy of the Inudum tribe. He was eventualy captured and shut away in a cell in the deepest dungeon in the fort and left to rot. However Craydar survived and now has escaped his cell. He is tearing his way through the guards in a bid to escape the fort and must be stopped before he makes it outside...

The powerful necromancer Dagoresh is responsible for the destruction of the Dwarfs of Ruzdum and many other evil deeds. For many years he has been working on creating an undead empire by saturating the land with necromantic magic. It's time he was stopped before he completes his work.

The beast know as the Queen Pteron resides deep in the caves. The Queen controls all the Dark Petrons and obey here every command. She however is not a weak creature and can easly destroy enemies who try and kill her.
Ancient Ruler of the land, Lord Semerkhet had a troubled time of life, his problems also followed him into the death and he vows vengence upon all who enter his lands and distub him.

The Stone Sphinx is an ancient statue of Sphinx. Within the statue a demon of the ancient world is bound. Unfortunatly the Statue has begun to break and the Sphinx has come to life and is under control of the demon within. The Stone Sphinx must be destroyed before the demon within escapes totaly and wreks havok upon the world.

The Warlord Ko Lash is the ruler of the tribes. In recent years he has become more and more paranoid of the other Orcs as he is ageing and the others demand a new and more powerful leader. Although gaining in years he is still a brutal and powerfull warrior and will kill any who try take his title from him, turning the would be challengers skulls into trophies for himself.

Dazmorr the Burned was once a normal man, however an accident occured in the caverns that left Dazmorr burned and on the brink of death. Dazmorr feared death and with his last breath sold his soul to the dark powers. Now Dazmorr is a powerfull demon and nothing of his former self remains within the scarred and burned out body except pure evil and hate.

Xinderoth is unparalleled in Magic. He can create creatures to do his bidding from a magical energy he discovered. He is hundreds of years old and no one has been able to find out the secret of his longevity. Though incredibly arrogant, he is one of those rare individuals who can back up his boasts.

The most notorious pirate Captain of the Craggy Coastline is Capt.Guzak Guzh. Guzak Guzh is an Orc with a fearsome temper and most would rather surrender to him than fight him and his powerful fleet of pirate ships. Recently Guzak Guzh has been on dry land with his crew and rumor has it that he is serching for buried Elven treasure close by.

Queen Shildorah is the powerful ruler of the Lenzwer Dryads and a weilder of great magic that stems from her magical white staff. She sees the Lenzwer forest as her kingdom and will expel any intruders to the forest with the most extreme force.

The infamous Pirate Queen Blackbury rules over Smugler City and commands the a great pirate fleet that has been the scourge of the surrounding seas. It is roumoured that Pirate Queen Blackbury is protecting a great treasure that is hiden on the Gorgon island although none know what it is.

Stheno is a vicious female monsters with razor clawed hands and hair made of living poisonous snakes. Stheno is the one of the most evil Gorgons and delights in turning those who have come to slay her into stone statues with her magical gaze.
The undead horror known only as   Kreth's Dark Visage, haunt these tunnles. Who he was in life is unknown, but it is thought that he may have been involved in necromancy when alive.
Old One Eye loves being a Salver. He can cause people endless misery and get paid very well for doing so.

The Tursas seems to be driven by an unseen force to attack all those on the Dread Claw Sea or surrounding area. Little is known about this dreadful creature, but some think that the Shadow Lord uses Tursas as a plague upon this region.

Qana the Dark Wyvern is young by the standards of such creatures yet has existed here for over 1000 years. Qana is a terror to behold and few have survived encounters with the creature. Hemovores that live in the area think of Qana as a punishment sent by their own evil god to kill those who dont spill enough blood in his name.

Doctor Morbidstein is an insane genius and has been experimenting on the human body and trying to unlock the secrets of the human brain with his knowledge of surgery and sorcery. He has begun to create monstrous creatures with this science and is always on the look out for fresh people on which to experiment on...
Trillsarin believes that one owes nothing to history. You should act according your own conscience and let others decide the rights and wrongs of that which unfolds.
The Elves believe that this beast is a herald of all that is good in Nature and that it is crafted by the very hand of Light, to show all who see it that there is always hope.

Snake Priest Ahuitz resides within the depths of the temple counting his gold. He has become corrupted by greed and cares not how he gains more wealth. However, now that the gold mines of the Teotal are dry and the Otoomie mines are going the same way, some whisper that Ahuitz will soon go to war with other lands in order to seize more gold and with his command of the Feathered Serpents few could stand in his way...

Jurao Kal has ruled the secret kingdom of the Fae for years beyond measure. This is not important to the magical creatures as time is really a Human concept. He views all non magical creatures with suspicion, for he does not understand how any creature can cope with the world without the joys of the connection to the magical energies that the Fae take for granted.

droppedItems.itemName: Fae Lord Seal of the Kingdom

description: The creature known only as the Scylla hails from the blackest depths of the seas. The Scylla is a horribly grotesque monster that looks like some sort of aquatic hydra and like the hydra, has many heads upon long necks. These heads are full of sharp teeth that drip a powerfull venom.

Not much is known about the man known as Master Shu Zi or even if that is his true name. What is known is that he is part of the secretive and magical lightning order of assassins. Master Shu Zi is in the city for reasons unknown, and any who cross him, run for fear that they are the one he has come after...

Fu Yarg was once a great Wind Dragon and like the others of his kind they cared not for harming or destruction. However Fu Yarg was captured and tainted by Pyromancers, who then infused his body with fiery spells and curses that turned Fu Yarg into a hate filled Fire Dragon. Nothing of the once noble Fu Yarg is left within his cursed body and the beast he has become just lusts for fiery destruction.

Qan Shrar is the protector of the Claw Temple. This Dragon is feared by outsiders for its bad temper and rumor has it that it can create storms around it when in a particularly foul mood. Although sacred to the monks, Secretly some have brought around plans to dispose of Qan Shrar as his temper is making the temple unsafe and replace him with a younger and more noble Green Dragon.

Jia Ton is an Ore Dragon, with power over metals. Jia Ton is a jealous dragon and the Scale Temple chose his brother as the guardian of the temple instead of him. In time hidden in a cave in the mountains Jia Ton created a plan fueled by anger. Jia Ton attacked the temple and devoured his brother. Before the monks could react he subverted them under a powerful spell and now they are his minions and do his bidding, Jia Ton must be destroyed to free the monks...

The Celestial Dragon, Meng Zhang (Elite) is the Ultimate Guardian of the Celestial Temple and Master of the Dragons from the previous Temples. He watches the weave of Fate and has noticed that you do not show in it's tapestry. He believes you to be an agent of the Shroud. Knowing that you have killed the Dragons of the other Temples, he believes that you must be tested. If you fail, you die. If you succeed, He will offer you council regarding your future.

Jia was once an attractive young woman. Other women wanted to be her and men wanted to be with her. However time started to take its toll on her precious and once flawless skin. After only a couple of wrinkles appeared on her face she became ashamed of herself and went into hiding. She has become so consumed with fear of ugliness that it has corrupted her and made her what she always feared to be, an ugly old hag. She lashes out at anyone younger or more beautiful than her out of rage an jealously and has been known to wear their skin afterwards.

Batarr the Brigand King is the leader of the outlaws that live in the Desert of Brigands. Batarr rules with an iron fist and through fear, commanding his men to get him great wealth and killing those who oppose him. It is said that very soon he will have amassed enough wealth to buy a large army and use it to gain him more wealth by sacking other settlements, this cannot be aloud to happen...

The Wraith of Necral has haunted these parts since the fall of the Falorn. It is unsure who the Wraith was during life, or even if he was ever alive in the first place, but his essence is bound to the Fields and cannot leave. This has enraged the Wraith and it has vowed destruction upon the world outside his reach and has begun creating a undead army that he soon plans to unleash upon the outside world...

The ruler of the corrupted Dokfarn Elves is known as the Witch of the Lake though her real name is Adryiel. She is said to be many thousands of years old and lives within a legendary tower built in times immemorial known as the Fluent Spire. From this tower it is said that she communes with the Deity of the lake and casts her spells on enemies only she can see from the immense height of the spire causing destruction upon foes that dare disturb her realm on both sides of the lake.

Boss Vakkash is a cruel and spiteful Hobgoblin. He is leader of an army of Hobgoblins and is hell bent on revenge against the Elves of Dokfarn who he sees as responsible for the destruction of a large area of his lands. He trusts very few and sees all strangers as agents of the Elves and has them put to death without trial, guilty or not.

Prince Sarlonde of the Albs was once next in line to become king of his people. But it was discovered that he and a group known as the Blood Cantnr were carrying out murders and dangerous rituals of power that are forbidden by law. The Prince and his group were chased out of their lands and have sought refuge with the Sa-Lith in Elrill Dungeon, waiting in hiding until the time is right to seek revenge on his peaceful homeland.

Farn-org is a great and ancient treeman. Farn-org hates the world, having been just a sapling at the time of the rise of the Shadowlord it is said he grew up in one of the legendary Shadowlords gardens, and was tainted from the start. How he came to be in these forests is a mystery but in such magical places beings as great and deadly as Farn-org can easily hide unseen till they wish to reveal themselves once more to the world.

Heitwar is an ancient dark elf who learned dark magics from the Shadow Lord himself. He continues to prepare his army for an assault against the neighboring Eltwier Province. He is committed to recruiting the local beasts to add to the ranks of his ever expanding army before launching one final devastating strike against the Elven fortress situated deep within the Eltwier Province.

Lord Eltwier once governed over the entire Reinen continent before the Age of Dissent. Many years ago, one of Eltwier's most trusted generals had splintered away to create what is now known as the Domain of Heitwar. Lord Eltwier is now locked in a bitter conflict against his once most trusted General, Heitwar. Eltwier has recently gained control of certain enhanced archaic obelisks that allow him to monitor his territory from the saftey of his own fortress, however rumors that the Obelisks are corrupted by dark magics are circulating.

Lagarto was the son of a blacksmith who resided within the Torgais city. Lagarto was born deformed and his father hid him away from public the best he could but one day he was discovered and was cast out by the city. He was forced into hiding within the maze like sewers, learning quickly how to survive in this dangerous environment and soon becoming bestial like the creatures he hunted, with his last traces of humanity being only the hatred of those who shunned him as a child.

Zelrokh is a young monarch, taking the crown at the age of seventeen after his father was killed in battle, something he has never gotten over. He has ruled the land for seven years but being so inexperienced he has taken influence from the laws of others. Zelrokh secretly intends to resurrect the kings of old to help him in conquering the Eltwier province, and eventually the whole region.

spawningInfo.realmName: City of Torgais (Halls of the Fallen)

description: For thousands of years this beast has been tasked with guarding the entrance into the Chasms of Meidos, slaying all those unworthy of entering the underworld.

Capable of assuming the shape of any living creature, Meidos rules one of the few underworld domains, while sending his minions to dispatch threats beyond his personal reach. It is unclear whether the Shadow Lord's dark magic has reached as far down as the underworld, however it appears Meidos holds many ideals common to those of the Shadow Lord himself.

Greedy and power hungry; these are the two most prominent traits Echibor is known for. He rules over the Kingdom of Gohar with an iron fist having risen to power after his uncle the previous Sultan died at the hands of an assassin. Echibor is hated by his subjects but few will ever step out of line as his laws are harsh and the punishments given are extreme.

This infamous beast stalks ponderously through the Nismildor Slopes. This creatures hunts alone. Having killed off all the neighboring Carnosaur', this solitary beast possesses a considerable amount of territory, thanks to it's constant aggressive nature. It is now on the move through the forest as it pursues food, that is becoming scarce in the forest.

Ai Chay Ke is the most devout worshiper of the Zinsaur people. He is blessed by other worldly powers and acts as a vessel for them, channeling through him the potent essence of the Zinsaur God of War. Having lived for thousands of years as an avatar for the gods, Ai Chay Ke can assume the form of the the Zinsaur God of War at will, beholding powerful abilities capable of smiting those who rise up against him in a torrent of fire and blood.

Baron Sehikra assumed control of Ethigor following the death of the previous Baron at the hands of the Azlathans during the great battle of Corrtua. Baron Sehikra is a competent warrior having learned many skills under the toutalage of his warrior monks.
This creature was tamed by the Tregdor Dwarves to protect the underground entrance. The beast has recently become rebellious and seeks to kill anybody who enters its domain.

Huistrel, the black hearted Dwarven King of the Muisru Kingdom rules with an iron fist. Huistrel is a practitioner of many evil magics and with the help of his weapon smiths he forged many burning magical weapons that are gifted to his warriors, making them formidable foes indeed. Huistrel also makes use of necromantic sorcery and some say he plans to use it to become immortal and forever rule his evil kingdom.

This once graceful creature is thought to be one of the direct descendants of the ancient Dragons that protected the famous Fallen Sword. Orrotaui Fire Drake was gifted a mysterious gold collar for saving an old man from foul beasts in the jungle. It turned out the old man was in league with the Shadow lord and the collar has corrupted the soul of Orrotaui, turning him into a creature of evil.

One of the descendants of the original guardians of the Fallen Sword from the west. Echigal has never been a good dragon, shunned as a hatchling and disliked by others of his kind he went into exile, becoming a vile evil creature know in lore as Echigal the Invidious. Practising forbidden necromantic magic Echigal now creates an army of the undead that, in his twisted mind, will help him destroy all goodly dragons in the world.

This gigantic Bird swoops down upon the largest of prey to pick it up and carry it away to its nest. This beast has constantly been harrassing local villages, tearing off roofs and carrying away cattle. The Dimcriee Roc has made its nest within an old crypt.

Little is known about Elzthor the Decayings past, although it is known he was once an Elf Apothecary of some fame but had withdrawn into the shadows and since become a member of the Plague Lords, a shadowy group that dabble in little understood sciences, creating poxes and plagues they unleash upon the world. Elzthors filthy presence in the forest has spelt its doom through his most evil disease concoction yet, the Dark Rot. he must be stopped before he spreads his Rot to other lands...

The Ice Maiden is the leader of the Ice Nixies are the sole beings with knowledge of the treasure that lays hidden on the mountain. The Ice Maiden is a fearsome warrior who's magical frost blade is said to burn with the power of 1000 blizzards and with it can turn a man to ice with but the slightest scratch or conjure up hail and ice storms to blast at those who seek to take the treasure from the mountain.

The grizzled and evil Ratlord Jenzer is said to be the victor of many unseen battles underground and holds great power in the Ratman society. He has turned his one good eye on Goitha and sends out his troops into the city from his base in the Groltin Graveyard. None know exactly why the Jenzer and his ratmen have chosen to attack, although there are rumours they had to flee a more powerful enemy to the east and now need a new place to dwell.

Queen Zlat Ooly is the leader of this Isopteran colony and the general behind the destruction of the Ratmen who once inhabited the tunnels. The Queen is power hungry and forever longs to drive her army and people onwards to destroy and plunder new lands and once her people have taken what they want from the tunnels they will move on destroying all in their wake...

Koura was once a lowly shepard but he had always dreamed of power. After learning about how magic can bring a man ultimate power he went on a quest to find powerful artefacts and by using the magic of the Djinn he gained wealth and the City itself. After he was disfigured he became paranoid and studied the dark arts of magic. Some now say a dark voice whispers in his head telling what evils he should partake in...

The Azmar was once a human warrior from Helmirr. He defeated a great warrior sent by the Shadowlord himself to Helmirr.  The Shadowlord  rewarded him for his skill with a magical gauntlet. It was so infused with magic that it begun his ascension to daemonhood and causes everything he touches to crystallize, even his own Fortress and the land around it. It is said that Azmar is so power hungry that he will do anything to ensure the destruction of Helmirr.

Guildmaster Krazork is a criminal who basically owns the City though a combination of wealth and fear. The ordinary citizens and government fear to step up to him and his personal army as it has grown to powerful. It is said that his extremely expensive armour was forged by his best Ironsmiths but laced with dark magic that makes him all but invulnerable to attack. However he must be stopped somehow...

For the longest time the Schwarzhurg family ruled over Graelenshire until it was discovered they were Vampires and the castle was burnt down and all the Schwarzhurgs thought killed. But one lived on. Kurt survived and has taken over Horrowal Dungeon using his undead minions and plans revenge on the towns folk of Graelen with an army of necromantic monsters. He must be stopped...

After the demise of Santork Claws, his second in command took his place (and claw) and begun to rule over this ice covered land under the name Son of Santork. This Evil and bad tempered greenskin wants nothing more than to ruin everyone's Xmas cheer...

It is said that Zozortor was cursed by a powerful Ifrit Djinn he stumbled upon when he was a young man, the fiery being cursing him to be unable to stand the heat of the land. Zozortor retreated to a cold underground cave and when he returned to the surface he had become a great Magus. No one knows what powers he found in the cave but he has wielded them to create an natural freezing land around him out of spite.

Skargor the Brutal is leader of the Skar tribe. It is said that Skargor got his trade mark scar when he did battle with the great Giant Direfist but eventually killed the Giant with a well aimed chop to the Giants face with his great axe blacktooth. Scargor is more cunning than the average Orc and has a well formed army for a Greenskin and with his troops numbers growing his army is readying themselves for war...

The Leghra Deathspinner is the most deadly species of Giant Spider that live around the ruins. These giant Arachnids are covered in iron hard chitin and their poisonous fangs drip with a venom that is so powerful it is said to instantly liquidise the preys insides, making it easier for the Deathspinner to eat later.

The Phantasms are described as  the ghostly apparitions of dead people that are said to float peacefully across the ethereal plains. Phantasms were forced by the Magic of the Amulet of Souls to be corrupted and once this has happened they become evil ghostly beings of great power and fuelled by anger to all mortals.

Zanadorn Unzul is the lord of the Riangi Dwarves. He is a cruel and uncaring Dwarf who just wants to see his enemies crushed into the ground and the beginning of a new dark age. Some say he has close ties with the Shadow Lord but none could ever know for sure.  Zanadorn carries an axe of great power gifted to him by his most skilled Executioner. It is said to burn with the fury of a thousand evil Demons and a strike from it can steal your very soul.

Legend has it The Keeper of the Way has protected this bridge for untold centuries. Why The Keeper protects this bridge or what secrets surround it are unknown as none who face The Keeper survive combat, becoming meals for the Harpies that make this area home.

A lurker of the black cold depths, the Deepwater Sentinel will kill all it finds. The beast has a cunning intelligence that takes most by surprise. In a fight with one of these watery beasts, a careless Warrior will be a dead one.

The Captain of the Athalin is Firsum Satero. This Ruthless Elf is said to have sailed all the seas of the world and plundered countless lands. Firsum and his pet sea Dragon Ulluor have been involved in many a sea battle. It is well know that Firsum will pursue an enemy around the world if he feels it is necessary, like the Kraken that tore off his hand, who he finally slew in a deadly sea battle.

The Aspect of Rock is a powerful elemental that draws its strength and power from the very roots of the realm. Unlike other elementals, the Aspect seems to be steeped in arcane energies as well as elemental ones and can call upon great destructive powers if need be.

The old deeps speak to Salshara. Because of her devotion, she is protected by the strength of the Sea. She has been gifted with artefact's from the Seas itself, ancient armor and weapons said to be magically forged in the unknown depths.

Blackmane is a huge and ferocious Werewolf. There's not much of a human mind within the monster now, just hatred again anything not cursed as he is. This has resulted in him creating a pack of Werewolves which are terrorising this part of the Forest, killing everyone and destroying structures.

This unpleasant Werewolf appears to have been responsible for the deaths of the Woodsmen in this area. It appears he was looking for some easier prey this time. It would appear however, that you have caught him in the act!

The Cursed Prince is not evil. He has merely forgotten what it is like to be a man. The Young Woman he has kidnapped is trying to help him remember and recognises a good heart under the Beastly exterior.

Legends say Captain Blackrot was one of the most feared pirates ever to sail the seas, cutting his enemies down in swathes with his enchanted cutlass. But he and his crew became cursed and bound to the island known as Skull Cove. Now ranked among the undead he and his crew are said to protect a magic treasure but no one has ever survived long enough on the island to find it...
An immortal swordsman, Gai Gen has served Fushiyoma for as long as he can remember. He protects her against all threats. Not even death can keep him from his duty.
This warrior has walked the Realms for ages uncounted. His only purpose is the will of Fushiyoma that drives him to deliver death to all who threaten the Guardian and her purpose.

As Captain of her personal Guard, Katsuma seems to hold a special favor of Fushiyoma. It is said that his blade was gifted to him by the Underworld Guardian and it bestows upon him special abilities. What these abilities are have been theorised on by scholars for a great deal of time. But few have survived an actual combat with the undead Warrior to give any definite evidence that this speculation is correct.
A being of pure light and magical energy radiates both power and goodness. The air is shattered with a loud boom as the Aspect moves in its sudden, jolting manner.

The Deathwing Manticore was a beast that terrorized Karthak in ages past. It was killed by a hero of the city and its name passed into legend. However it once again prowls the Heights of Mount Volmar. It does so with the tireless endurance of the undead.

High Liche Xpynor was once the most powerful wizard of a long lost and forgotten land. He is now the Dreadlords most trusted advisor and general to his armies. Xpynor is a great necromancer and his powers in the magic of undeath are so powerful it is said that a single word from his dusty skeletal mouth can tear your very soul from your body...

The Dominated Necromancer is a nameless man under the thral of the Dreadlord. The Necromancer seeks to learn from the Dreadlords skills and has been using skills gleamed from many different evil and necromantic sorcerers to create undead beings in the caves such as the Spell Scarred Skeletons and other monstrosities.

The Greater Quango is a huge terrifying carnivorous Bird that storms around the Island looking for things to eat. These giant Quangos are even more dumb than regular sized Quangos. However, it is said that if you stand still for long enough the Greater Quango cant see you.

Niseag is a terrifying beast that lives deep in black waters of Loch Nis. Niseag is feared by the locals, who since times long past must regularly sacrifice one of their own to the beast in order to keep it from leaving the water in a murderous rampage over the island.

Unah is the Brownie Queen of Galduir Grove. Although tiny in size her magical abilities are far greater than any other creatures in the forest and has defeated all who have come before her. She is an untrusting creature and any foreign or evil being in the forest is quickly destroyed by Unahs Brownie army.

None know where the Beast of Brogan Cane came from but it has lived within its cave longer than man has lived upon the island. Local legends tell of a giant rodent living in the cave and that death awaits all who dare enter its cave with its nasty, big, pointy teeth. And indeed all who have gone to kill the Beast have never returned, presumably meeting their end within the jaws of the beast.

Yarlung is the Yeti King. He is a Tyrant and rules the land with his icy fist. Many disagree with the rule of Yarlung and are trying to overthrow him and make the land a happy and fair one once again. Yarlung will not give up his power hold over Mehteh without a fight and his army of Yeti warriors stand ready to fight any who rebel...

Bartnten, Druid of the Glacier. Once a drunk and thrown out of his town he still remained cunning and has now grown in power and strength to become a threat to all. He is trying to raise Ymir, the greatest of all the Frost Giants from within the Glacier and use the giants power as a weapon against his enemies.

Valitor the Fire Dragon and his spawn have recently awoken from their slumber in their cave due to fresh volcanic eruptions on Steinnheim. Valitor is one of the most hated dragons in the region and he was thought dead by the peoples he terrorised before his slumber. Now he has woken and it is likely he will begin his reign of terror again soon...

Lord Eldgrim the Brutal is leader of the Sea Kings against Ranulfston. He was given the title of Brutal after his many exploits overseas where he enjoyed killing his enemies in ever more horrifying ways with his great battle axe. He wears the Ironscale armor made from the hide of the greatest of Ironscale Wyverns to ever live, Grugzaka, who was killed by Eldgrims Grandfather and the armor passed to him.

The Avatar of Glykek was built from stone by the Priests of Za and inscribed with the rune of Glykek the Deathly Slayer. After many sacrifices and spilt blood Glykek himself has begun to animate the Avatar, living once again in the mortal world. Glykek still hasn't fully materialised however and is still weak, but its only a matter of time before he is ready to be unleashed upon the Trun and then the world...

Greengutz is the leader of the Gozoids and the fattest of their kind. It was his plans that secured the takeover of these Halfling Lands and the enslavement of its people. Its quite well known that Greenguts and his lads are planning to strip the land of food and wealth, then eat the population before moving on to the next area to feast again.

Oh no! It's the Great White Turkey! Beneath those iron hard (and also startlingly white) feathers and not-at-all-cute face is a tasty, tasty bird! This is one bird that is determined that you shall be the prey!
The Syndicate Leaders are trying to get fair working conditions for everyone. Is there something sinister? Not really, no.
The Sun Stealer is an Elemental Force which patakes in a ritual to return the Sun to the skies and chase away Winter.

A great being of pure power rules over the tower. This being is one of the evil and ancient Myagar Genies and is known in ancient scripts and tomes of lore as Gahk Dafay the Untouchable. Gahk Dafay along with his kind were imprisoned within a series of magic lamps but somehow he was released and has no intentions on going back to his prison quietly...
The Watching Dead whisper to the Chief of the Clan protecting the Bone Tooth and keeping them hidden from prying eyes. The secrets of the Clan is it's strength, and those must be at all costs.

Lord Shuito has reigned over the Kingdom of Chul for hundreds of years. Some believe he has been corrupted by the Shadow Lord, hence his unnaturally long life. Lord Shuito's minions have begun carving up the forests within the kingdom in order to fuel his ever expanding army while sweeping aside any resistance from the native populace.

The Lorsillian Warmaster is behind the mass destruction of the surrounding woods. The reasons for this will be discovered soon enough but will you survive a confrontation with this superlative Warrior?

The Dire Barrow Wraith has moved into Lorsil Fortresses Barrow as there is more magic in these grounds, allowing the vile Undead to grow in power. The way was left open due to the dissipation of the Honored Elvish Dead and they will need help banishing this abomination from their home.

The mighty Thornvine Treeman has been in control of the Thornvine actions against the Lorsil Drow, whom they perceive as foolish, destructive beings, unwilling to live in harmony with the Realm. They were unaware of the Warmaster machinations until recently but are unwilling to believe the Drow are mending their way. The Treeman is the being you will have to convince!

Pythius the Deceiver is well know to those who study demonology. His skills in lies, deception and trickery are among the best in world and have caused the downfall of many great warriors in the past. Once an agent for the Shadowlord, Pythius lied to him once too often and was finally banished to this island where he is said to be plotting his revenge against the Shadowlord and gathering a small army of demons around him.

The Son of Gnok is a giant ape the size of a house that is worshipped by the locals as a god, second only to Gnok himself who apparently dwells further in the jungle. The Son is only kept from destroying the tribes on Nangoo by regular human sacrifices that he carries of into the jungle to consume. His next sacrifice is said to princely indeed and should please the Son of Gnok greatly...
Gristera Matriarch is the mother beast. It is being used to spawn massive numbers of Gristera Shadow Bats. Obviously this beast is being harnessed for this purpose but by whom?

Labsarx is a colossal Magma Dragon who roosts in the core of this Fortress. He is responsible for the corruption of the Umbar people to the Shadowlords cause. He must be confronted! Answers must be sought as to whom he is receiving his orders. Retribution must be sought for the Corrupted souls of the Umbar!

This powerful cannon has been infused with the a lesser demon, the rage of the demon appears to literally fuel the Doom Maws fiery blast. Although the Valgothic Dwarfs have a concern with the danger of the malignant spirit gaining full control over the weapon, with further testing and runic enhancement this problem will be eliminated.

A powerful mage in life Gatto received two gifts from the Shadow Lord himself, a spell book and stave. With these two potent artifices Gatto claimed the Town of Atrum for his own kingdom. He then turned his own necromancy on himself thus becoming a powerful Lich and gaining even more control over his undead minions.

Acerbuss has been seduced by the powers of the Shadow Lord, his weakness means that he has given himself completely over to the darkness. The darkness has dominated him to the point that there is almost nothing left of the original mage, only the desire to taint others to be just like him. Unlike most, Acerbuss's words are more dangerous than his spells.

Shadow Necromancer Gatto was never fully destroyed. His spirit endured and sought reprieve for his failure at the foot of the Shadow Lords throne. He was denied this but was spared oblivion and he returned to the cursed lands of Atrum where he had hidden a resurrection ring and begun to regenerate his mortal form. Now stripped of his arcane gear he has resorted to using base necromancy to raise a legion of zombies around him in order to destroy those who caused his fall from grace...

Brooding in darkness against the injustice of being cast out of the Magic Circle. Jinsar carves Gargoyles out of the surrounding crystals of the caverns in an effort to make a powerful Golem, and seek vengeance on those who rejected him. Unfortunately, his creations are a reflection of his own flawed and brittle nature. Each failure drives him ever deeper into the depths of frustration and insanity.

Ugolum is a particularly ugly and fat Ogre that guards Bane Pass. None get by Ugolum without being thrashed with his hound chains or bludgeoned to a pulp by his mace and becoming his dinner. Many have tried to sneak past him but have been brought low by his wolfounds. Those mauled victims are taken to Ugolums cave to be salted or pickled and eaten at a later date as snacks.

The Gate Crashing Witch is a mean spirited and foul tempered meanie. She has been corrupting the Woodland Critters because they were far too cheerful for her liking and the bears! Well! They dared ask her why she was sleeping in their beds after eating their food. Of all the nerve! Just for that, she turned them into Teddy Bears and kicked them into the forest. She'll stay in their cozy house until she's eaten everything!

The Mean, Kidnapping Dwarves are a gang of thuggish layabouts. They work as little as they can and to such ends, they decided to kidnap the daughter of the nearby Queen and put her to work as their maid. They didn't expect her to be so rebelious and have locked her in a dwarven casket which has put her to sleep. They certainly aren't going to release her!

The Vengeful Witch is the creature that put the curse on the Prince that turned him into a beast. She found out about this and flew into a rage! Who dares interfere with her schemes?!? Since she could not find you, she settled for the one who got you involved. The kind hearted girl. The Princes new betrothed. She shall pay for this transgression!

Gang Leader Jack has used a magic bean he had stolen which grew into a beanstalk. He led his gang up the beanstalk to see what was there and was delighted to find a peaceful giant with loadsa loot. One axe applied to a giant later and the loot is his for the taking!

The Wicked Ratcatcher is a nasty little fraud. He was waiting for the townspeople to get desperate and call upon him. They didn't and are now killing and eating his verminous pets. In a fit of rage, he has used his magical flute to set his pets against the townspeople while he mesmerized their children and kidnapped them all, taking them to his mountain lair through a portal.

Father Valach is the creator of all the Moroi, the progenitor of this foul race of vampires. Valach constantly feeds to keep him strong and to stop him degenerating into a blur. As the strongest of his kind he commands all other Moroi to do his evil will, capturing unfortunates so they can sustain his power.

Akunamakati is the Akuna tribe champion. Their greatest warrior. All the other tribes in Katannis fear Akunamakati and his great stone hammer. A great follower of the Akuna way of life all he demands is death of his foes or his own death at the hands of a warrior greater than himself.

Ssylor rules over the Vipesh. He is the most powerful of the Shamen and dwells within the temple of Voresshh. The Demonic energy that burns in  him is so strong he has become more Demon than Vipesh. Ssylor is said to be summoning a great Demonic entity from the other side, a so called gift from Voresshh. Who knows what the consequences may be if it is allowed into the mortal world...

After their fathers death Xerdes younger brother Sadinus was appointed king of Lacedonia. Rumour has it that their father could tell Xerdes would be a weak king and rather than let the kingdom fall into ruin he would break with tradition. Many of the people wanted to see Xerdes as king and hated change. Xerdes hated this also and tried to assassinate his brother but failed, and was exiled to the hills. In exile he learned potent magical skills and made his plan of revenge by building an army.

Xerdes placed the Knossotaur in the labyrinth to guard over the captured daughter of Sadinius. However since Xerdes was defeated no one ever returned to release her and Knossotaur stands guard still. Knossotaur is a giant Minotaur who only followed Xerdes command. He is a relentless guard and fighter and will kill all who come for the princess.

Rillian the Wizard is more ancient than he looks and his body has turned into crystal, a side effect of the magic he wields. An irritable character he has learned to hate sound, something that resonates through his crystal body causing him great pain. He plans to use his magical obelisk wards to amplify a spell over the world that will mute all sound for good. This must not be allowed to be...

The cause of all the undead activity in the Dead Coast is down to the latent abilities of the aquatic Necrozodont. This creature is the last of its kind, a creature whos very blood is cold evil. Presumed long extinct for good reason, the Necrozodont exhales necromantic magic into the air and water and thus the dead rise. Killing this evil race once and for all will end the areas undead plague.

After the dungeons were abandoned the Guard of Kai remained. He knows nothing of the outside and was built by the cruel Dwarfs just for the purpose of controlling the prisoners and protecting the dungeon. Any creature he sees and catches in the Dungeon he will assume is an escaped prisoner and will hunt them down and either kill them or return them to their cell and throw away the key.

The Bunkyner Cultists believed they were summoning help against the Orcs, in a way they were. Unfortunately the demon Aumku Hotkar wants to kill everything including the village folks and the Orcs and who knows what else! If he escapes the catacombs he will cause fiery death upon the world outside!

Herdmaster Trok is the leader of the Snorgherd and mastermind behind the assault and capture of Grokhiem. This giant of a Beastman towers over even the largest of his kind and is clad in black iron armor. His leadership is all that holds the Snorgherd together, without him the Snorgs would loose hope and  flee back to the mountains they came from. He must be destroyed...

Keros the Hydra Hound guards the mouth of the Cave of Ozank, the way out of these hot volcanic lands. This beast is so ferocious all other creatures in Pelopon fear it and any who do not soon become its next meal and are added to the many bones and skeletons that litter its lair. The triple howl of Keros is enough to chill the blood of any hardened warrior as it means certain death...

The Fantastic treasures here are not what they seem. Known only as He who Glitters by his magically enslaved Dwarfs, this powerful and greedy entity not only rules over the treasure room he is the treasure. He who Glitters is a creature of magic and takes the form of a great mawed tidal wave of coins and treasure that sweeps up and crushes any who dare steal from him.

The Pheonice is a the frozen terror of the mountain itself, preying upon the Sherpan people and their herds. The Sherpan see this great frozen bird as their god of death and all fear its call that will echo down the mountains creating avalanches and rockfalls. When ever encountered the Pheonice brings with it the wrath of an ice storm, and any who are not taken with it back to its nest are frozen to death in ice cubes.

General Ydmar leads the Ice Elves of Fydjordo. His word is law and even the king and queen of Jordo bow to his will. Ydmar is a megalomaniac with prejudices over any warm blooded creature, preferring the perfect coldness of ice. His ideas have been taken up by most of the Jordo, but those who do not share his beliefs stay quiet for they will share the same fate as a warm blood if they speak out.

Within the portal on Eye Island dwells  the great Dragon Moskenstraumen. This monstrous creature from the dawn of time was imprisoned within the portal, for the storm is tied to Moskenstraumen, following in his wake as he moves. It threatened to destroy the world under black clouds and crashing thunder, thus was Moskenstraumen bound in the Portal. Having called out to distant kin in the form of the Dracs, their empowerment of the portal has released this terror upon the world once again, though as yet, he is not at full power though that time is surely closing...

This demonic creature has taken the form of one of the Tribes Quango but at a much greater size! It has corrupted some of the tribes Quango and now stalks the Volcanic Core suffocating and cooking all around with its superheated gasous body!Boiled alive. A Fowl way to go!
additionalNotes: Requires item: Rune of Clear Air

description: Pythius has returned from his disappearance under the the new title of Pythius the Black. Pythius the Black is still king of deception and trickery and has apparently been using his skills to build an army of demonic entities recruited from this realm. Pythius has grown in power over time and his new form oozes raw Demonic magic that he is using to create a portal big enough to lead his new army back to the mortal world...

Skarius is the Lord of the Mines in the desert. He oversees the project from his burrow lair, a huge castle like formation set in the centre of the mines. Skarius is even more ruthless than the rest of his race and will stop at nothing to get rich from the katadiamonds, a magical stone that demand high prices all over the world.
additionalNotes: Requires item: Empowered Hammer of Shar

description: Zandrin Master Geomancer is the leader of the Valgoth Geomancers. His skills in Geomancy are unparalleled and his mineral body is said to be older than the land he walks upon. Zandrin has taken his coven of Geomancers to the top of the volcano where they are preparing a ritual. The purpose of the ritual is unknown but is unlikely to be in the best interestss for those of flesh and blood...

It appears that one giant Tarman rules or commands the others, the so called Darktar. Darktar is saturated in magic although he appears unaware of it or its power. His motives on the surface are unclear but they seem to be malign and it would seem that killing the inhabitants of the land was one of his goals that is now complete, although it is unknown if their undeath was part of the plan or not.

Papa Bohnaf is a master user of voodoo magic and was exiled to this Island by his people for misusing his powers and forbidden necromancy. He has grown bitter and hateful on the Island and has slowly risen an army of Nzumbe around him and intends on escaping and presumably taking his revenge on his people.

Inargal is a huge bloated demoness that rules over the Ziggurat like a god. Her power is great and fueled by the worship of her followers and the sacrifices made by her Fiends and the secretive Fold. Their have been many attempts to banish this being back to the void but none have succeed but unless she is cast out soon her power may become to strong to ever banish and the world will be in danger from her and her forces.

King Chodrman is the leader and finest warrior of his people. Only the strong and brutal may lead the Chodrman people and must prove himself regularly by leading war parties from the city and bringing back tales of victory. The Corallian people are often victims of the king and his battle lust but it is only a matter of time before the king and his war host destroy the Corallians for good and move on to terrorize others...

Many legends surround the origin of Brood Fiend White. Some say it was once a human sorcerer that was cursed. Others say it is a punishment sent from angry gods. What is known is that this bloated sack of horror and filth is the mother of all the insects and vermin that crawl and slither on the island. The root of these beasts must be destroyed and in doing so will end their disgusting grasp on the island.

Queen Kummar is the Ullikummi ruler. A fiery and strong ruler she can easily control her angry, restless people. She knows the giants want war with the hated beings of the surface and has put her best enchanters to work on a way to allow a people who cant survive outside the heat of their caves to go to the cold surface and start the war they so crave.
additionalNotes: Requires item: Rune of Kummi Freezing

description: Frugarz the Devourer is the leader, or rather, the strongest and largest of the Bonegwar. His name is only known by the villagers because he often bellows it when he attacks with the other Bonegwar. Phrases like "Furgaz smash!" and "Furgaz hungry!" are heard over the tundra more often these days and prompt mass fleeing of locals from the close by villages.

Tariki is the last living descendent of the Necral and has has been cursed by the gods that abandoned his people. A powerful wizard, Tariki is refining a powerful spell his people created long ago that caused the giant crevice-like Randkluft to open. It was to destroy Caruftun and its people so that the Necral could feed the souls of the towns dead to their God. The plan failed however and Caruftun exists still, though in two halves. Tariki's refined spell is to complete what his people started, feeding the souls of the villages dead into his fallen God, bring about a dark rebirth!

Blacksun is a former god of evil and destruction, and perhaps one of the gods who cursed the Necral. However he and his minions were somehow magically trapped inside ice that eventually became the Bidlect Glacier and he was stripped of his Godly powers. Now free from his prison he plans a great ritual in the darkness that will see him rise as a god once more and terrorize mortals.

The Mega Mole is a work of insane (but effective)genius! Masterminded by the mad Moleman Engineers this mechanical nightmare is being prepared for its mission - to tunnel through the sewer into the city of Ostorin and rampage through its buildings killing and destroying everything!! The Mega Mole is armed with huge claws and a powerful nose mounted drill for extra destroying capability!

Strixous is the mightiest of all the Great Owlbears. It is he who calls for the coven to convene and knows what their secret business is. Enraged with the damage strangers have done to the forest and the natural flow of magic here, he personally wants to dispatch those who are responsible. He is not an evil being, just saddened by the ignorance of the unwise, perhaps defeating him in combat and explaining your side of the story will change his deadly mindset...

The Khan of Zhang is the leader of the tribes on the heath and the smaller tribes pay respect to him. He is the greatest of the tribes warriors and his skill on horseback and in battle is legendary. The Khan however is an honorable man and respects his opponents and will never employ dishonorable techniques in a fight, but woe betide those who would dishonour him. He has a fine rack of heads of those who have done so in the past!

spawningInfo.realmName: Zhang Plains (Arena of the Horse Lord)

description: Momonan is the king of the Ancon Barbarians and carved out his kingdom in a decade long war against the Greenskins that infested this land. Although he is happy with his kingdom and gets his fair share of combat and ale he is tired of the unskilled opponents he fights on a daily basis and yearns to meet a warrior with the skill to match him in single combat or even beat him. Are you worthy of this contest of arms?

Gotra Gotra is the god of the Scragorn. In reality however he is little more than a well fed pet, albeit a very large and carnivorous pet. Gotra Gotra is possibly the last of his kind, a large beast that is akin to the giant reptiles from aeons past. He hunts the cracked land between the forests, looking for any who might have got trapped here or fallen down, but always returns to the sacrificial drops for feeding time.

The Emissary of the Shadowlord, whoever he was, has fled. The being known only as Aiontarus stands alone in a room surrounded in a magical fire. Legends tell of Aiontarus and his many titles - bodyguard to Emissary, High Executioner of the Emissaries Will, Fiend of Blue Flame and many others. Why he remains is a mystery but it is clear he aims to add your skull to his trophy rack...

An unknowable horror from the nightmarish realm of Elsewhere. This vile entity is utterly divergent to anything in the sphere of the living. It has one all consuming ambition, to remake this plane of existence so that it can be absorbed into Elsewhere along with everything within.

A prophet of the Old Ones, Tantrathull has given himself over to them completely. He has sought to bring as many to the True Gods as he can and they have rewarded him for his dedication to their wisdom. The Crestoun authorities think him a raving fool, they will pay dearly for their arrogance.
additionalNotes: Requires item: Saber of the Seer

description: Mesmerized by her spiraling visions of the Old Ones, the Chanter Of Verse has been enthralled by their ageless wisdom. She chants what she sees in weird contorted mantras.

An unknown Captain of a forgotten vessel that ran aground on the shores of Sea Razor Isle still walks the planks of his ship. The reason why is not completely clear. Some say the Captain jealously guards the gold and jewels the ship still carries within it's rotten hull.

The Old Ones require a tribute fit for their ascension. The Soul Butcher cleaves the useless flesh from then ever living flame that resides within all mortals. When he has collected enough to light the Runes of Power, there shall rise and a new Court of the Externals. Upon that day, there shall be a new dawn and all will know and bow before the endless and all powerful True Gods.

Chill Marrow is a vicious frost demon. It appears to be gathering demons and undead adventurers to it's banner for an eventual  invasion of the surface world. This is a plan that cannot come to fruition!

Fae Lord Ortanda has ruled in Rawneth Forest since ages past. A formidable magic user and Warrior, he has recently taken to a new form of warfare, riding to battle on the back of a magically enlarge Odonta Dragonfly. Together, they are a powerful force, striking from the darkness of the forest like a thunderbolt!

Harakar, the Priest Lord is the guiding light of the savage Zinsaur peoples of this region. Both a mighty warrior and practitioner of holy magics, he is a formidable foe! One which has been tainted in his worship and must be removed, for the good of his people.
Maganor is a vile demon inhabiting a dead husk. It is a disgusting being and seems to be vaguely related to the extra dimensional beings from Crestoun. Is this foreshadowing a future threat?

The Gargantuan Pyron Sidewinder more than lives up to it's name. This huge snake has no problem traversing the sandy dunes and is more than happy to eat anything they come across, be it Gherdlia, Pyron Strider or you.

Fraganir the Chill is a vast Frost Dragon, believed destroyed. It seems that she landed here in ages passed and before going into a healing slumber, froze all the water nearby, turning the top of this region into a glacier and staving the surrounding regions of water. Now, having healed somewhat, she appears to be awaking. Now is likely your only chance to stop her for good!

The Gelorath Daemonwall is exactly that. A demon that has been defeated and had it's essence bound to the rock of the caverns. Over the ages, the raging demon has taken control of the stone and moulded it into a new body, after a fashion. It uses it's new control over rock to trap creatures and adventurers in stone or crush it to death.

The rampaging Grofflesnout in the region are being lead by a monstrous brute of a Chief. This thuggish monster rules through raw aggression and will happily tear into anything or any one who stands in his way!

Ovig the Despoiler was an ancient despot. A mighty warrior-mage, he conquered a vast swath of land and ruled it through fear and blackest magic. After hundreds of year, he was finally destroyed, though before dying, he claimed he'd return. Centuries later, Brother Janosz found a painting of the Despoiler. He started restoring it, only to find the painting contained the essence of Ovig, who is now try to ensnare his mind and find a way back into the world of the living!
additionalNotes: Requires item: Spook Smasher Slime Spewer

description: The Denarath Sloggonoth is a vast reptilian monstrosity, worshipped by the local Troglodytes.Fast, aggressive, armoured in natural scale and with a gaping maw, filled with rows of razor sharp teeth, this monster is not to be trifled with.
Haramoth, Scourge of the Valley, is a Giant warlord who moved his people into the area and has caused trouble ever since.

The bleak soul of Sorren is only warmed at the misery of others. He found shaped those cast out into the wilds by others and taught them that to feast on their enemies you drew their strength into themselves. It might even be true, its just hearing the screams of the tribes terrified victims brings such joy to his heart.
A powerful Dark Mage, Lord Vardinlok is draining the very life from the Sathrin Forest for his own foul and dark purposes.

Xinderoth Sarabaites are one of the orders of Doth. The Xinderoth Sarabaites are the highest order of Doth and have mastered Xind magic and the use of the deadly Doth blades. They are the most powerful mortals Xinderoth has under his control.
To summon an undead the necromancer must enter into a contract with the God of Death GorGulGol. He only gifts the majestic spirits of dragons to his most devoted and talented servants.
Possessed by the demonic entity of Khairn, Rufia rules the city of Thracan with an iron fist, employing a number of mercenaries to carry out his bidding.

Faluis the Destroyer is a great demonic entity which has descended to the mortal realm in order to enslave the mortal people and coerce them to build a mighty fortress in which to reside. Parallel to this, Faluis is also forming a giant army within a large cave network in which to destroy those who would oppose his efforts.

King Fikbil is a greatly respected chief of his tribe. Only the strongest warriors ever have the chance of leading the tribe, and Fikbil, having achieved countless victories over neighbouring tribe, has fulfilled the role of tribal leader for several years now.
Sat upon her throne deep within the Mjodir Bastion, Kastrial orchestrates her forces to seize neighbouring territories in the name of Mjodir.
Goranoth the Ice Giant is just that with one minor exception, that being that he is long death. This huge undead behemoth wanders the Kantariss Woods looking for fresh meat to gorge upon.
A powerful witch garbed in tattered rags. She holds control over the creatures within the swamps, using powerful voodoo magic to manipulate their will to carry out her bidding.
Having led a large invasion force of trolls to these lands, Gropa the Terrible has seen to it that all Elves are killed.

Synlust the Succubi Queen has set up the Jadhara Catacombs as a new seat of power. She has only just started, so she is still fairly weak. At the very least, she's made sure she looks gorgeous. What Succubus wouldn't?
This massive creature controls the more subservient creatures with powerful psychic powers.

The Tomb King Pohiae has ruled this region  for thousands of years, controlling the beasts and vermin that plague every inch of these lands. It is through these creatures that he is able to survey every part of his dominion, and manipulate the native inhabitants to carry out his bidding.
Little is known about Xinchi the Mighty, as few ever escape the wrath of this crystal-armoured behemoth.
Lord Belanath has reigned over the Kingdom of Sernath for hundreds of years. Some believe he has been corrupted by the Shadow Lord, hence his unaturally long life.

Ranathak Ice Heart is a vast Ice Dragon. His progeny litter the lower levels of the mountains. This gargantuan beast swoops around the mountains, unleashing freezing blasts of pure cold from his cavernous maw.

The mysterious and powerful pirate king, Enchidor rules over these islands with the help of the native creatures. These creatures have been placed under a powerful spell to do the pirate king's bidding.
The Inferno Lord rules this region with an iron fist, shaping the hellish lands with the use of archaic dark magic.

Twisted Rapunzel is a poor girl who has been held captive by the Strangely Youthful Witches. Over time, their magic machinations have twisted the girl and she attacks anyone that's not one of her insidious "mothers". These attacks seem to come as much from her ensorceled hair as it does her clawing nails! She must be freed!

Big Billy Gruff is the alpha male of the Billy Goat Herd. His vicious streak has lead the herd to attack all other inhabitants of the Troll Toll Fields including the poor troll who simply wants to maintain his little toll bridge. He must be dealt with.

The Murdered Queen, was laid low by her (literal) witch of a Mother-in-Law. This didn't quite work out the way the Queen Mum expected as the Queen rose again as a corrupted revenant and killed her right back before rampaging throughout the castle, infecting her subjects with the same supernatural malady. She has since been trapped in her old quarters. How will you defeat her?

These once adorable, lost twins have been corrupted due to the Cursed Bards and have become murderous little terrors. They are stalking the poor woman of the woods, who they seem to believe is a witch. You have to stop them from killing her and break the enchantment.

Poor Cinders. She was nearly ready for the ball thanks to her Fairy Godmother. That was until the Cursed Bard music warped the spell. Now Cinders is unhinged and is seeking not only her sisters to repay them their abuse but she now wants to see if her new glass daggers will fit in the Prince!

These formerly helpful scamps have been corrupted by the Cursed Bard and instead of helpfully creating beautiful footwear, they're now creating murderous ankle-biting shoes. However, will you stop this pair?
The evil Rumleskaft has been defeated by the savvy Queen but he refuses to honour his bargain. He will beat her once and for all and claim her baby as his prize. He has to be stopped.

The Grouchy Goblin just CANNOT stand this time of year. Everyone is soooo HAPPY and CHEERFUL. It's sickening really. So he's decided to nick the star for their tree. Let's see them stay cheerful THEN, huh?
For those he hasn't slaughtered, this Serpent Lord is feared by millions of others.
The Greater Xmas Demon is the boss of the Vile Xmas Imps. He is trying to make sure that the villagers do not make their Ris A La Malta which is an offering for the Jultomte house gnomes.
Alikir was Enria's most powerful Champion Mage. Shortly after the ancient wars which tore this region asunder, Alikir was commanded by Enria the Devourer to rule over this realm.
Enria is a powerful god-like entity which descended upon the plane of mortals to rule over its inhabitants.
Drawing power from clusters of magical crystals within the cave, Ryfell commands with an iron fist over those who reside within these lands.
The Deathspinner Grotesque is a gargantuan spider that rules the ruins of the castle it has made it's nest. This gigantic, armoured behemoth will kill and devour any who dare trespass in it's domain!

The Gedhar Juggernaut is the mightiest defender that the Forest's gestalt conciousness can summon. It is a titanic elemental, drawn from the most ancient and mighty trees of the forest. It has finished the demons but the forest, in it's damaged state, sees all non woodland life as a threat. Including you.

Tharg Thunderpunch is the ruler of the giants in the Mistaroth Mountains. A being of prodigious strength, he's gotten bored of beating everyone else up and instead has had his minion build an arena and now delights in watching his own people beat each other to a bloody pulp.

The Lord Protector rules over the town of Gadral with an iron fist. Many have risen up against him, but countless have fallen as a consequence of their disloyalty. A dark presence seems to hang over him, though no one but you seems to recognise this.He rules his court from the large throne he fills with an enormous warriors physique. He appears utterly relaxed and in command.

The Dark Queen of Tellroth is a woman of truly staggering magical ability. She is clad in armor similar to her Magi but much more ornate, with considerably heavier plating. It is the work of the Queen and her Magi that has filled these tunnels with the dead and damned you have encountered.

Vanasaar the Frightful is a necromancer of terrifying power. It is he who has raised the dead of the Tywith Farmland, having had his Guardsmen and demonic hounds kill them all first. His power appears linked to that of the Dark Queen. Was he the master? Or simply another pawn?

Boronoth the Vindictive was once a Malogre, like the rest of his kin. However, a jealous and petty being, he fell under the sway of Burzzthak the Exalted and joined the Shadow Lord's legions. Slowly growing in power, he has returned home and brought his people low, killing them and raising their newly undead forms to start an army in the Shadow Lord's name!
